body:
So... This is a newlywed couple in which the wife read too much Netoraserare and thought "Their love seems to have developed more by making the woman infidel? What if he does it instead of I?
Then, she regrets her decision as she sees her husband about to have sex with another woman in front of her?

Never read Netoraserare as a couple, kids.
@ravenleaf Most hentai sites and Japanese themselves don't make  a distinction between netorare and netori either, nhentai  usually sucks at tagging anyway
What is this? Is this sequel Netoraserare or what?
They don't know how to NTR tag on here. a majority of cheating and netori get classified as it, its like they forget netroi even exists
